summary: Provides a LayoutLM-specific tokenizer that transforms raw text into token IDs using a WordPiece vocabulary, applying optional lowercasing, basic tokenization, handling special tokens (CLS, SEP, PAD, MASK, etc.), and offering utilities to construct model inputs and token type IDs.
business_intent: Enable preprocessing of document text for LayoutLM models, supporting tasks like document classification, information extraction, and question answering in document AI pipelines.
